description: Starter set of user interface control/display mechanisms that might be used when rendering an item in a questionnaire.
name: Questionnaire Item UI Control Codes

text.div:
Questionnaire Item UI Control Codes

Starter set of user interface control/display mechanisms that might be used when rendering an item in a questionnaire.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/questionnaire-item-control
